Vanilla Cupcakes

Delicious and fluffy vanilla cupcakes that are perfect for any occasion.

Ingredients

  • 1-1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup granulated sugar
  • 1-1/2 teaspoons baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup butter, softened
  • 2 eggs
  • 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
  • 1/2 cup milk

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. Line a muffin tin with paper liners.
  3. In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
  4. Add butter, eggs, vanilla, and milk; beat until smooth.
  5. Divide batter among liners, filling each about two-thirds full.
  6. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  7. Let cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
